techs.name: Hive Mind
techs.quote: 'With minds united, they looked to the stars.'

techs.name: Storage Organisms
techs.quote: 'Many strange organisms lined the walls of the nest, each holding a curious liquid.'

techs.name: Gene Harvesting
techs.quote: 'Through our own enemies we will grow strong.'

techs.name: Bio-Weapons
techs.quote: 'The acid coursed through the creatures mouth, and was then promptly let loose upon the enemy.'

techs.name: Mineral Ingestion
techs.quote: 'Even the earth itself is fuel to their hunger, its minerals serving a purpose yet unknown.'

techs.name: Aquatic Adaptations
techs.quote: 'He who commands the sea has command of everything.' - Themistocles

techs.name: Chronostasis
techs.quote: 'Our mind has no need to fear time, for it has taken every measure to protect itself from deteriorating.'

techs.name: Synaptic Structures
techs.quote: 'There were strange devices built into the hive's walls, which were thought to have boosted its mental capacity.'

techs.name: Counteradaptation
techs.quote: 'Using the genes they absorbed from previous kills, the creatures became perfectly adapted to hunt their prey.'

techs.name: Titanic Weaponry
techs.quote: 'As the hordes of smaller creatures pushed deep into the enemy territory, the larger beasts stayed behind to unleash hell upon their foes from a safe distance.'

techs.name: Bio-Structures
techs.quote: 'The hive's lair was surrounded by rudimentary structures, a paradise of flesh and chitin that prevented any chance of invasion.'

techs.name: Mineral Adaptations
techs.quote: 'The beasts' arms glimmered in the moonlight, revealing the metallic nature of its weaponry.'
